def solve(s):

    if s[i] is a letter, reverse its case from lower to upper or vise versa,

    solve("1234") = "4321"
    solve("ab") = "AB"
    solve("#a@C") = "#A@c"
    """
    if not s:
        return s
    # get the upper case letters
    upper = set(s.upper())
    lower = set(s.lower())
    lower = lower - upper
    # reverse the letters
    for i in range(len(lower)):
        s = s[lower[i]]
    # replace the upper case letters with lower case ones
    s = s[lower:]
    # return the result
    return s
